events.title: Parish Family Breakfast
events.description: Join us after 8:00am and 10:30am Mass for a hearty breakfast prepared by the Knights.

events.title: Coats for Kids Drive
events.description: Collecting new and gently used coats for families in need. Drop-off boxes in the narthex.

events.title: Council Christmas Party
events.description: Annual celebration for members and families in the parish hall. RSVP required.
